general_advisory: Harvest the matured vegetables & pulses and store in a safe place. Protect the vegetable nursery from rain. Start field preparation for rabi crops. Sow mustard, sarson, sunflower, field pea, carrot, radish. Broadcast pulses in matured rice crop. Deworm and vaccinate livestock. Maintain cleanliness in poultry houses.

advisory: Harvest paddy when 80-85% of grains are matured.
Dry paddy grains to 14% moisture for consumption and 12% for seed purposes.
Control BPH infestation by alternate wetting and drying techniques or specific pesticides.
Apply Emamectin benzoate or Profenophos for American bollworm control.
Control bacterial leaf blight with specific treatments.
Address grey mildew infestation with appropriate sprays.
Sow mustard from Mid-October to Mid-November.
Treat seeds with Thiram or Bavistin before sowing.
Use recommended varieties for best results.
Follow similar sowing instructions as for mustard.
Use appropriate seed rates for optimal growth.
Control leaf webber, leaf folder, and defoliators with specific pesticides.
Manage pod borer infestation with neem-based pesticides.
Use pheromone traps for borer insect monitoring.
Control insects chemically with recommended sprays.
Install traps for thrips monitoring.
Control thrips infestation with specific chemicals.
Regularly deworm and vaccinate cattle and buffalo.
Consult with veterinary doctors for reproductive issues.
Similar care as for cattle.
Check animals for dehydration, heat stress, and parasitic infections.
Deworm and vaccinate animals appropriately.
Similar care as for goats.
Use raised platforms and deep litter systems in poultry houses.
Maintain cleanliness and disinfect regularly.
Control stocking density to prevent stress and overheating.
